top_comments.comment: These court decisions that support the news media that do research and fact check verification of their stories should continue.  The bogus law suits on liable should pay the defendants for defending themselves when they lose their court cases.

WHETHER WE AGREE OR DISAGREE.

I am concerned about the attack on free  speech extreme right wing corporations already own a lot of news media even The Wall street  journal is owned by the same person that owns  fox News   .trumpy put a lot of right wing Federalist Socity judges in many courts and  the federalist society helped pick who and where they are packing courts to get the out ome the confederate/Republicans want  total control of our country  they  are wanting an autocratic government which means no free speech

I find it to be a complex issue. I absolutely agree with the points here. But we also have a new problem that we’ve never had before. Social media. It has allowed tiny marginal groups to build up power and spread very dangerous ideas. Everything from COVID denial to the spreading of white supremacy to flat earthers and anti-evolution and climate change denial, etc, etc. Some of those seem almost harmless (flat earth) but they represent an anti-science, anti-facts, anti-truth culture that has become very powerful here and around the world. It’s extremely dangerous and makes it hard to have discussions over policy (which is what I purport we should be arguing about) and instead arguing over basic, provable, facts. I think our country, and the world, is in severe danger because of this.

I don’t have a solution. Free speech is an absolutely critical right. The most important right. But the world has changed. What do we do to protect free speech, but ameliorate the damage caused by social media’s outsized soapbox that it gives to every crazy theory out there. It takes advantage of the flaws in our psychology to make us angry and react without consideration.

*sigh*
